title: Reader for watch (Wear)
summary: The program for reading e-books on the watch.
developerAddress: Россия. 143982, Московская обл., г.Железнодорожный, ул.Смельчак, д.14 3774

Bugs and suggestions please tell your email.The program allows you to download e-books and text files from your phone to watch and read them.Usage: When you first start on the sd-card will created folder - WearReader. Just copy the files into it and if they are supported, you will see them in the program and will be able to download to watch.Features:  - Change the encoding of files before downloading  - Manage books from your mobile phone  - Change the background / color / text size  - Bookmarks  - Voice search  - Adding books from file manager over "Share"  - Support wrist gestures - https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6312406 Supported formats: PDF / TXT / EPUB / FB2
descriptionHTML:
This is the first version. Bugs and suggestions please tell your email.

The program allows you to download e-books and text files from your phone to watch and read them.

Usage: When you first start on the sd-card will created folder - WearReader. Just copy the files into it and if they are supported, you will see them in the program and will be able to download to watch.

Features:
  - Change the encoding of files before downloading
  - Manage books from your mobile phone
  - Change the background / color / text size
- Bookmarks
- Voice search
- Adding books from file manager over "Share"
- Support wrist gestures - https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6312406

Supported formats: PDF / TXT / EPUB / FB2
comments: Great app the only epub reader that works needs to be updated for wear 2.0 play store since android phones don't sync apps anymore
Probably the best reader. Especially for txt format
This is a rip off! Do not buy! It's absolutely impossible to transfer books with it. If I use another app for the transfer, it's still impossible to open them with this garbage. Do not buy!

Absolutely fantastic app.  The ONLY reader app for Android Wear that actually works...and works well.  Autoscroll, clean, efficient interface, fonts, optional folders, PDF support, etc.  Really great job!
It works Would like auto scrolling of pages. Maybe bigger text options as well.  But it works which is the most important thing.
recentChanges: Maximum text size is increased to 20
